author: Kurzgesagt – In a Nutshell
description:
A digital copy of you could chat with friends, live in a robot, or maybe even outlive you. But is it really you? And would you want that?

#kurzgesagt
#inanutshell #kurzgesagt_inanutshell #learnwithshorts #science #mindupload
